评论概述: Liked it so much I ordered another
评论详情: Super cute t-shirt that runs true to size. I'm on a bit of a cat shirt binge and ordered this design in another color based on how much I liked the first. Keep in mind that these are iron on, not printed but they have been holding up in the wash. As it fades and cracks it will add a bit of a vintage look to it.
Great shirt! Everything was as expected. The fit was right on. Good and comfortable material.

This is a soft shirt, very comfortable.  The design is very cute, but is starting to peel off in some areas.  Nothing that detracts so far from the design, but does make me think it won't last.  I wash it inside out, and it's been washed approximately 4 times.
The fit is good. The color is good. I love the topic.
The transfer of the decal to the tshirt is mediocre.  There are bits missing.  Otherwise the shirt is fine.
This was a birthday gift for a 10-year-old and she loved it!
I bought this shirt for my 18 yr old granddaughter for Christmas and so did her mother, although in a different color! Great minds think alike! She doesn't mind having 2 of a funny shirt.
It looks like some of the design is washed away or faded.  I love the design, I just wish it looked better in person.

I should have paid more attention to the results of the iron-on being distressed.  It’s clear in the photo when enlarged. The t-shirt material is thick, but coarse. Hoping it will soften after washing.  I’m not a fan of distressed things so I give it a 2.
The shirt is cute but it's way too short, needs to be 6 inches longer.
